item.title: Webinars diving deep into GP 2010
item.description: I’ve been working on in-depth GP 2010 webinars for Microsoft Certified Trainers (MCTs) and Partners. These webinars offer step-by-step guidance on setting up and using the new features in GP 2010. As a bonus, all were created and presented by MCTs. Check them out â€“ we hope they help you get your clients ready for GP 2010! Business Intelligence & Reporting (This one is mine!) This demonstration-based presentation covers the setup and use of new reporting and business intelligence enhancements in Microsoft Dynamics GP 2010.
